name: phageannotator-genome-annotation
title: Phageannotator: Bacteriophage Genome Annotation
description: Specialized annotation of bacteriophage genomes. Identifies structural genes, DNA metabolism, lysis cassettes, and lifestyle prediction (lytic vs lysogenic). Ideal for phage genomics and therapy. Samplesheet format: `sample,fasta`
content:
Phageannotator: Phage Genomics

Comprehensive bacteriophage genome annotation with specialized tools for viral genes. Predicts structural proteins, lysis genes, and phage lifestyle.

Applications

  • Phage Therapy: Characterize therapeutic phages
  • Phage Discovery: Annotate novel phages from metagenomes
  • Comparative Genomics: Phage diversity studies
  • Safety Assessment: Check for toxins, AMR genes

Key Outputs

  • Gene Predictions: Structural, DNA metabolism, lysis
  • Lifestyle Prediction: Lytic vs temperate/lysogenic
  • tRNA Genes: Phage-encoded tRNAs
  • Genome Maps: Annotated visualizations

Perfect for: Phage therapy • Phage genomics • Metagenome phage mining • Comparative phage studies
